email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, specifically $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were expecting. Would you be able to come down to the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $48.50 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised quote. $48.50 is more in line with our expectations. However, we’d like to lock in the laycan at 15-18 October to avoid any delays. Can you confirm this? Also, could you provide the vessel’s full specs for our records? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’m glad the revised rate works for you. I can confirm the laycan as 15-18 October. The MV Ocean Star’s full specs are as follows: DWT 150,000, LOA 280m, draft 18m, built 2018, classed by Lloyd’s Register. Let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the confirmation. Everything looks good on our end. Let’s proceed with the MV Ocean Star at $48.50 per metric ton, laycan 15-18 October, and demurrage at $15,000 per day. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent! I’ll await the charter party agreement. Thanks for the smooth negotiation, and I look forward to working with you on this shipment. Let me know if you need any further assistance. Best regards, Sarah
